Scene:
The House of Tokutayu (Tokudayu or Tokutaifu)
(Tokutayū sumika / 徳太夫住家)

Play: The Old Tale of Kusunoki (楠昔噺)

Production: April 1971

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Toyotake Komatsudayū II (豊竹小松大夫 (二))

Takemoto Tsudayū IV (竹本津大夫 (四))



Shamisen Players:

Takezawa Danjirō IV (see also Takezawa Danshichi) (竹澤団二郎 (四))

Tsuruzawa Kanji VI (鶴澤寛治 (六))
